subject: Re: Two Mini-Box files
author: rosemary_guiley
full_text:
Hi Misty,

In "It's dark" I was making a remark about how "they"ight have
curiosity about the device I was using.

In "the box is talking," the clip catches a few sounds of conversation
I was having with others present.  I actually like this one the best,
because it seems clear that the words ride on top of the scan not in
direct response to a question, but making use of the noise matrix to
chime in with a comment.

Intriguing!

Rosemary

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Misty" <bulletbabea@...> wrote:
>
> I can hear those. Whats interesting is I cant understand what the heck 
> you are saying LOL but hear them loud and clear.
> 
> Misty
> 
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "rosemary_guiley" <reguiley@> wrote:
> >
> > Hi folks,
> > 
> > I've posted a couple of clips for feedback, obtained with my Mini-Box
> > #115 June 14 at Ohio State Reformatory in Mansfield.  Both occurred in
> > the solitary confinement area: "it's dark" and "the box is talking." 
> > The speaker was a different one than I usually use, an iSymphony
> > T-Speaker from Radio Shack.
> > 
> > Thanks
> > Rosemary Ellen Guiley
> >
>
